availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred A. Lawrence (Oldham County, Kentucky, clerk, bookkeeper, and notary public)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, clerk, bookkeeper, and notary public. New York native. Son of Charles D. Lawrence. Married to Jane Graham Lawrence. Father of Maron Lawrence, Lillian Lawrence, Henry Lawrence, Caroline Lawrence, and Genieve Lawrence. Clerk in Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Bookkeeper in Oldham County, Kentucky, in 1860. Notary public in Oldham County, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 9, p. 879A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 820.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 7, p. 109B.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Kenton County Wills, vol. 1-2, 1858-1879, p. 140.
